location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 29/87 'Bahrain Agency: provision of new servants' quarters'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 16; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the construction of servants' quarters at the Political Agency in Bahrain and includes a plan of the Agency building (f 15).The file is composed of correspondence between the Foreign Office, the India Office, the Government of India, and the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf.
